name: Platform for better health
desc: HASBD.COM works for the doctors to find patients as well for the patients to find the right doctor and the right hospital services. It tries to build a platform for all – the patients, doctors, hospital owners, healthcare professionals and other health service providers to meet the need of good health for all. A patient can get all types of hospital services, even ambulance, online – that means all types medical services are a click away. This is our endeavor to establish one stop medical platform for everyone in Bangladesh. We believe that our online platform will help millions of people in Bangladesh to take the right decision regarding all sorts of medical and health related issues.
